slides.title: Welcome to Final Group II
slides.content:
# CMA Final - Group II

Group II covers **advanced reporting**, **sustainability**, and **audit**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Corporate Reporting** - Ind AS
- **SCF & Sustainability** - Value creation
- **Indirect Tax** - Advanced GST
- **Cost & Management Audit** - Verification

## Group II Papers

| Paper | Subject |
|-------|--------|
| 17 | Corporate Financial Reporting |
| 18 | SCF & Sustainability |
| 19 | Indirect Tax Laws |
| 20 | Cost & Management Audit |

slides.title: Business Combinations
slides.content:
# Ind AS 103

## Acquisition Method

```
Consideration transferred
+ NCI at acquisition
- Fair value of net assets
= Goodwill
```

## Consolidation

| Entity | Treatment |
|--------|----------|
| Subsidiary | Full consolidation |
| Associate | Equity method |
| Joint venture | Equity method |

## Control Definition

- Power over investee
- Variable returns exposure
- Ability to use power

slides.title: Financial Instruments
slides.content:
# Ind AS 109

## Classification

| Category | Measurement |
|----------|-------------|
| Amortized cost | Effective interest |
| FVOCI | Fair value to OCI |
| FVTPL | Fair value to P&L |

## Impairment

```
Expected Credit Loss model:

Stage 1: 12-month ECL
Stage 2: Lifetime ECL
Stage 3: Lifetime + interest on net
```

## Hedge Accounting

- Fair value hedge
- Cash flow hedge
- Net investment hedge
